title: Mesa Verde National Park: Brochures & Publications
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Brochures & Publications            Brochures and Publications       Below are some helpful publications for planning a visit to Mesa Verde National Park. (To get the Free Adobe Reader, which is required to read the pdf files, click here.) Visitor Guides Mesa Verde Summer/Fall 2016 Visitor Guide (May 27 to October 29, 2016) 11 1/4" x 13 3/4" newspaper format, (pdf, 2.5 mb)  Mesa Verde Spring 2016 Visitor Guide (March 6 to May 26, 2016) 8 1/2 " x 14" (pdf, 300 kb) Mesa Verde Winter 2015-2016 Visitor Guide (November 1, 2015 to March 5, 2016) 8 1/2" x 14" (pdf, 1.2 mb)    Wetherill Mesa 2016 Visitor Guide (May 1 to October 31, 2016) 8 1/2" x 11" (pdf, 500 kb)    Â     Downloadable Site Guides Cliff Palace, Balcony House, Spruce Tree House, and Wetherill Mesa (Long House & Step House) sites guides are available for free download at the Mesa Verde Museum Association website.
